title: The Y in Lithos, need alternatives
content:
Hi all,

Apologies if this is the wrong forum, happy for it to moved if it is.

Anyway, I absolutely love the Y in Lithos, it is perfect for incorporating into a logo. However, the rest of the characters don't fit in. Can anyone recommend any similar fonts that have a y, that basically looks like to arms reaching out (apologies, best way I could explain).

At this stage I am open to either serif or sans-serif, I am trying to give the font a friendly, yet traditional feel, sort of like a hybrid between the two if possible.

I may have to find a suitable font, then adapt the y to get it to have a friendly, arms opening feel, I just thought if anyone knew of any fonts to start with, it would be here.

Appreciate any help.

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content:
This should go in Design. :)

Taken care of.
